alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:18PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT COCONINO COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM MST... At 417 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Painted Desert Vista, or 10 miles northeast of Doney Park, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Painted Desert Vista and Doney Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Western Mogollon Rim
